backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic including user profiles, journaling, squads, reports, and authorization helpers using map-backed state and access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent app behavior changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing UI flows, modules, hooks, styling, and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint with DAGGER branding metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling Internet Identity login, safe actor initialization, profile loading, onboarding, and route structure with error states.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Journal entry editor enabling create, update, delete, and group‑sharing actions with validation, squad selection, and mutation‑based persistence.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, user menu, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Implements a two-step onboarding flow for user registration and disclaimer acceptance with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Provides a dialog for submitting abuse reports with reason selection, optional details, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/system/AppStartu: Displays a full‑screen error state with retry support for startup failures.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports the application's disclaimer text as a constant string.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines module-related interfaces and exports a list of training modules with quotes, interpretations, and prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, journaling, squads, and reports, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, handling initialization, access control, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with a red‑accent DAGGER-inspired palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Admin page for viewing, sorting, and updating report statuses, with permission checks and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Shows the user's squads and provides dialogs for creating or joining groups with client-side validation and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/GroupSharedEntries.ts: Displays a squad group's shared entries, members, and actions like copying invite codes, rotating codes, leaving, and reporting entries.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Displays community guidelines with loading state and static content inside a card.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Manages viewing, creating, and editing journal entries with search-prefill and squad info.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Shows learning modules filtered by category and allows starting a journal reflection with prefilled content.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Public landing page with app overview, disclaimer, feature cards, and Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Settings page displaying user profile, disclaimer text, and app information sections.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Empty placeholder file for squads page.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Empty placeholder file for squad shared entries.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCode.ts: Normalizes invite codes by trimming whitespace.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom theming (colors, fonts, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s purpose and listing implemented features including authentication, access control, onboarding, journaling, and moderation.
